Headline: #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute at Western/Ogden
ShortDescription: X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Ogden, California, Cermak and Western due to street blockage near Western/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Ogden, California, Cermak and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Ogden.

Allow extra travel time.
